meanings.definition: The position or role of being an instructor.
meanings.sent1: Her instructorship at the school helped many students learn.
meanings.sent2: He was promoted to the instructorship of the new course.
meanings.sent3: In her instructorship, she always wore colorful socks to make the students smile.
meanings.sent4: The instructorship was a beacon of knowledge in the sea of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The instructorship's impact on young minds was truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: The act or process of instructing or teaching.
meanings.sent1: Effective instructorship involves clear communication with students.
meanings.sent2: The instructorship of new employees is crucial for their success.
meanings.sent3: During the instructorship, the class erupted into a spontaneous dance party.
meanings.sent4: Her instructorship was a symphony of guidance and support.
meanings.sent5: The instructorship's influence on learning was evident in the students' progress.
